entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22.
